Highlighting the role of charity work: Highlighting the role of charity work
aboutMedad desc: Medad is a specialized center in studies and research that nurtures collective thinking for decision-makers and thinkers with expertise in charity work. It helps them understand the noble and organized role of charity work in building the nation's civilization.
Strategy and management desc: We provide a wide range of da'wa and charity events to enrich the Arab community and include all individuals of our Islamic community.
Event objectives desc: It has been decided to hold the event on the 17th of Ramadan, 1448, corresponding to Wednesday, 16/09/2025, at the King Fahd Cultural Center.
King Fahd Cultural Center desc: The King Fahd Cultural Center is a cultural center located in Riyadh, the capital of Saudi Arabia. It hosts cultural, literary, and theatrical activities such as art exhibitions, lectures, plays, and more. The center consists of a comprehensive set of cultural sections within one location. The largest of these sections is the grand hall, which contains 3000 seats. The center spans an area of 100,000 square meters.
Submit an application to participate in: Submit an application to participate in the event
Upload the search file desc: The research should be comprehensive and comply with the platform's policies. The file must be in PDF format and should not exceed 300MB.
Submit an application to participate in: Submit an application to participate in the exhibition
abutUsDesc: Charitable work has seen significant developments, transitioning from individual efforts to institutionalized work, requiring organization to achieve its goals effectively. Therefore, **Midad** was established as a specialized center for studies and research to support decision-makers and professionals, and to enhance the role of charitable work in the advancement of the nation.
the message desc: A non-profit center to enrich charitable work with research and information that supports building charitable decisions based on scientific and professional foundations, within the framework of ongoing partnerships.
The vision desc: Charitable work has undergone an institutional transformation that requires organized foundations. Midad came as an influential research center in building charitable decisions, supporting decision-makers and enhancing its developmental role.
Success stories we achieved with our suc: Success stories we achieved with our success partners
Government agencies desc: At Midad, we have worked to approve all our activities and interactions with 6 government agencies.
International Islamic Organization desc: In line with our vision and goals, we are honored to serve more than 30 Islamic organizations worldwide.
Donor institution desc: We have communicated, interacted, and succeeded with more than 46 recognized donor institutions.
Charitable society desc: Our duty toward our community is to provide non-profit services to many charitable societies.
contactUs desc: Contact us directly through social media channels, email, or leave us a message, and we will respond as soon as possible.
Have a question desc: Contact our support team, available throughout the week.
